publication.title: SofTOA: Software Ranging for TOA-Based Positioning of WLAN Terminals
Extending SWRL to Enhance Mathematical Support
publication.authors: alfonso s치nchez-maci치n,encarna pastor,jorge e. l칩pez de vergara
publication.abstract: This paper presents an extension to the Semantic Web Rule Language and a methodology to enable advanced mathematical support in SWRL rules. This solution separates mathematical and problem se- mantics allowing the inclusion of integration, differentiation and other operations not built-in to SWRL. Using this approach, it is possible to create rules to cope with complex scenarios that include mathematical
